choose.when: INSERT INTO RESERVATION (OID, BRDNUM, ID, BOOKERNAME, BOOKEREMAIL, BOOKERTEL, CPNNUM, RESSTA) VALUES (#{oid}, #{brdNum}, #{id}, #{bookerName}, #{bookerEmail}, #{bookerTel}, #{cpnNum}, #{resSta})
choose.otherwise: INSERT INTO RESERVATION (OID, BRDNUM, ID, BOOKERNAME, BOOKEREMAIL, BOOKERTEL, CPNNUM, RESSTA) VALUES (#{oid}, #{brdNum}, #{id}, #{bookerName}, #{bookerEmail}, #{bookerTel}, null, #{resSta})

mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RESERVATION WHERE BRDNUM = #{brdNum} AND RESSTA IN (${resSta})

select b.title, p.sdate, p.edate, r.oid, r.RESSTA from board b, package p, reservation r where b.brdNum = p.brdNum and p.brdNum = r.brdNum and r.brdNum IN (select r.brdNum from RESERVATION r where id = #{id})
